mapper.insert: insert into emp(username, password, name, gender, phone, job, salary, image, entry_date, dept_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{job}, #{salary}, #{image}, #{entryDate}, #{deptId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into emp_expr (emp_id, begin, end, company, job) values
(#{expr.empId}, #{expr.begin}, #{expr.end}, #{expr.company}, #{expr.job})
mapper.update: update emp_expr set begin = #{expr.begin},end = #{expr.end},company = #{expr.company},job = #{expr.job} where id = #{expr.id}
